QuestData.Title: Dream of Argus: The Crystal Reborn
QuestData.Description: With the shards recovered, it is now possible to restore the Dream of Argus. You must seek out the device that Maatun mentions in his journal, which is said to be in a cave overlooking Anguish Fortress.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate the crystal reconstruction device and use it to restore the Dream of Argus.

Objectives.Objective: Place the shards on the altar
Use the device restore the Dream of Argus
